sorry_only_youtube: Sorry, I can support only youtube for now.
no_idea_what_to_do: I have no idea what to do with that.
change_voice_instructions:
You have 2 options to change voice:
 - Press 'Language list' button, select language then select voice.
 - Press 'Voice list' button and select voice.
hello_message: Welcome! Write me some text. For more info use /help
change_voice_help: /change or /c -> help you to change voice change voice
change_volume_help:
/volume or /vl -> change volume 
    default value: -1
    range: -1<->10000, recommended range -1<->100
    e.g. /volume 100 (set volume to 100) 
    /vl 123 (set volume to 123)
    /volume   123 3 (set volume to 1233)
user_do_not_have_clients: You don't have clients, select client use /clients
